titles.title: There is a river that flows from deep within

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a river that flows from deep within
There is fountain that cleanses all from sin

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come to the river, there is a vast supply
Come to the fountain, that never shall run dry.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is a river that flows from God above
There is a fountain that's filled with God's great love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come to the river, there is a vast supply
Come to the fountain, that never shall run dry.
